host_ioc_objects.notes: Web shell file uploaded to web server, detected by file integrity monitoring system; filename matches attacker's web shell artifact from incident description. Full path not specified in narrative, so set to NULL per requirements. No hashes provided for this file artifact. Only host-based file IOC extracted from narrative as other elements (domains, network artifacts) are out of scope. User account 'hacker' not representable in required IOC types (no registry path/file path provided for user artifact).

timeline_objects.activity: Unauthorized file system change detected by FIM
timeline_objects.notes: Detected change included web shell upload and user account creation; confirmed via investigation
